welcome_message_body: Welcome to Stotfold, a charming town known for its beautiful countryside, historical landmarks, and friendly locals. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and experiencing all that this lovely city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 at Luton Airport is primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the terminal for up to 4 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cambridge Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Cambridge Airport is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stansted Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Stansted Airport is used for overflow and peak-time flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Royal Air Force Alconbury Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: For those traveling via private jet, the private terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport provides a luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
